AI Description: rebaler is a software tool for evaluating the performance of de novo genome assemblers by comparing their results against a reference genome. It provides detailed statistics and visualizations to assess the quality of the assembly.
Core Features: Performance Evaluation Of De Novo Genome Assemblers, Comparison With A Reference Genome, Statistical Analysis Of Assembly Quality, Visualizations For Easy Interpretation
General Tags: Genome Assembly, De Novo Assembly, Assembly Evaluation, Bioinformatics
